solution_line_template: The number of pies Cooper makes in {num_days} days is {pies_per_day} pies/day * {num_days} days = <<{pies_per_day}*{num_days}={total_pies_made}>>{total_pies_made} apple pies.
After Ashley eats {ashley_eats} of them, there are {total_pies_made} pies - {ashley_eats} pies = <<{total_pies_made}-{ashley_eats}={remaining_pies}>>{remaining_pies} apple pies.
